Room.Name: Heraldry Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a quiet hall whose walls are covered with colorful banners.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway is wide, clean and well lighted. Heraldic banners cover the the walls, each with its distinctive markings and colors. Famous families from generations back have placed their identifying flags here. At one time, this castle was the summer palace for the Lyanden royal family and it was known for its pomp and ceremonies. All royal families participated.
